title: How is life at GMC Patiala? - Quora

response.answer_text: Life at GMC PATIALA is pretty cool provided after 1st year MBBS …because 1st year they grill you…hectic schedule …all for Ur good ….hostel better avoided …u can get good pg or flat nearby new Lal Bagh which is at walking distance ….the faculty there is nice n cooperative ….ample staff available…sports activities like Cricket volleyball basketball n swimming n gymmin are present ….considering from where u belong u will find PATIALA different …chandigarh people won't find it much happening ….for shopping n chilling mall is there plus eatery joints are many ….i know many will comment about Internal politics n this that but hey where is it not ?? It all lies in how u adjust urself ….if u keep working in Ur own peace of mind then no place like PATIALA. .. moreover now being Punjab chief minister constituency it will develop hell lot .. additional benefit traffic is very low …u can reach one place to another in 10 min ….city people are nice n ROYAL …PATIALA PEG !! MOREOVER ITS ALL UPTO U ….I PERSONALLY HAVE SEEN GMC GROW ….N NO DOUBT ITS STILL A PREMIER INSTITUTION. …WITH ITS SHARE OF CONS N PRO'S….IN THE END ALL UPTO U ….HOPE IT WILL HELP
